IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values: image = self.GetOutput() #vtkImageData nx,ny,nz = extent[0],extent[1],extent[2] sx,sy,sz = spacing[0],spacing[1],spacing[2] ox,oy,oz = origin[0],origin[1],origin[2] # Setup the ImageData image.SetDimensions(nx, ny, nz) image.SetOrigin(ox, oy, oz) image.SetSpacing(sx, sy, sz) image.SetExtent(0,nx-1, 0,ny-1, 0,nz-1)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.

StringVectorProperty.name: InformationScript
StringVectorProperty.label: RequestInformation Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values: from paraview import util # ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY FOR THE FILTER TO WORK: nx,ny,nz = extent[0],extent[1],extent[2] util.SetOutputWholeExtent(self, [0,nx-1, 0,ny-1, 0,nz-1])
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property is a python script that is executed during the RequestInformation pipeline pass. Use this to provide information such as WHOLE_EXTENT to the pipeline downstream.
